languages.text: "Кроме прочего, мы получили послание от проктора Соломона Антара — арбитра, команду которого мы забрали с Райкада Минорис. Он просил вас об аудиенции и говорил, что будет ждать в доках Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "Кроме прочего, мы получили послание от проктора Соломона Антара — арбитра, команду которого мы забрали с Райкада Минорис. Он просил вас об аудиенции и говорил, что будет ждать в доках Футфола".

languages.text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."
languages.original_text: "Кроме прочего, мы получили послание от проктора Соломона Антара — арбитра, команду которого мы забрали с Райкада Минорис. Он просил вас об аудиенции и говорил, что будет ждать в доках Футфола".

traits.locale_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar — the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

"We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar — the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

"We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

"We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

"We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

"We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

languages.text: 「また、私たちがライカド・ミノリスから救出した分隊のアービトレイター、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人からの連絡も受け取りました。彼はあなたとの謁見を求めており、フットフォールのドックでお待ちしているとのことです」
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: 「また、私たちがライカド・ミノリスから救出した分隊のアービトレイター、ソロモーン・アンサール代理人からの連絡も受け取りました。彼はあなたとの謁見を求めており、フットフォールのドックでお待ちしているとのことです」

languages.text: "Bir de Rykad Minoris'ten mangasını kurtardığınız Yargıcı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar'dan haber aldık. Sizinle bir görüşme talebinde bulundu ve Binliman rıhtımında bekleyeceğini iletti."
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: "Bir de Rykad Minoris'ten mangasını kurtardığınız Yargıcı Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar'dan haber aldık. Sizinle bir görüşme talebinde bulundu ve Binliman rıhtımında bekleyeceğini iletti."

languages.text: «También hemos recibido noticias del Procurador Solomorne Anthar, el Arbitrator cuyo escuadrón rescatamos en Rykad Minoris. Solicita una audiencia y afirma que estará esperando en el muelle de Paso».
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: «También hemos recibido noticias del Procurador Solomorne Anthar, el Arbitrator cuyo escuadrón rescatamos en Rykad Minoris. Solicita una audiencia y afirma que estará esperando en el muelle de Paso».

languages.text: “此外，我们还收到了索罗蒙·安萨监察官的信息。我们从小莱卡德救出了他的小队，他希望能与您见一面，他说他会在落脚港的港口那边等待您的到来。”
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: “此外，我们还收到了索罗蒙·安萨监察官的信息。我们从小莱卡德救出了他的小队，他希望能与您见一面，他说他会在落脚港的港口那边等待您的到来。”

languages.text: "Wir wurden ferner von Proktor Solomorne Anthar kontaktiert, dem Arbitrator, dessen Trupp wir von Rykad Minoris evakuiert haben. Er bittet um eine Audienz und wartet in den Docks von Footfall auf Euch."
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wurden ferner von Proktor Solomorne Anthar kontaktiert, dem Arbitrator, dessen Trupp wir von Rykad Minoris evakuiert haben. Er bittet um eine Audienz und wartet in den Docks von Footfall auf Euch."

languages.text: « Nous avons également reçu des nouvelles du proctor Solomorne Anthar, l'arbitrator de l'escouade que nous avons secourue sur Rykad Minoris. Il souhait s'entretenir avec vous et a indiqué qu'il vous attendrait sur les docks de Castel. »
languages.original_text: "We also received word from Proctor Solomorne Anthar, the Arbitrator whose squad we retrieved from Rykad Minoris. He has requested an audience with you and said he will be waiting at the Footfall docks."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons également reçu des nouvelles du proctor Solomorne Anthar, l'arbitrator de l'escouade que nous avons secourue sur Rykad Minoris. Il souhait s'entretenir avec vous et a indiqué qu'il vous attendrait sur les docks de Castel. »
